Class ec.e.file.EDirectoryRootMaker

Class ec.e.file.EDirectoryRootMaker 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.file.EDirectoryRootMaker
public class EDirectoryRootMaker
extends Object
A privileged accessor class to top-out the recursion entailed in file and directory access using these classes. Only one instance of this object may be instantiated, and should be closely held.

EDirectoryRootMaker(Vat)
Construct a (the) directory root maker.

makeDirectoryRoot(String)
Produce a directory object for a file system root.

EDirectoryRootMaker 
  public EDirectoryRootMaker(Vat vat)
Construct a (the) directory root maker.
Parameters:
vat - The Vat in which this directory tree will be used.

makeDirectoryRoot 
  public EEditableDirectory makeDirectoryRoot(String name)
Produce a directory object for a file system root. Note that any directory in the system with a known path name can function as a file system root for this purpose.
Parameters:
name - The pathname of the root directory.
Returns:
An EEditableDirectory object describing the given directory.
